channel.title: Ffs cleaned v4 needs improvement
channel.description:
[b]Omg why doesnt combat work in cleaned v4 cleaned v4 is messed.. when i click to attck i disconnect I didn't touch the combat methods someone help.. if i hit 0 its okay but i think if im about to hit i disconnect i couold be rong and just disconnect randomly in npc combat p.s. pvp combat works fine in wild[/b]
and how do i get npcs to walk around.. heres my spawn method: [code]//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 2 2602 3101 0 2600 3101 2604 3103 2 Man[/code]
wut walktype do i put?
